issue.title: [IR] Add filter expression to Source node
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14350](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14350). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add an optional filter expression to `Source` nodes to allow consumers that push predicates down to push them all the way to the source.
